snippet: The Montreal Canadiens have agreed to terms with defenseman P. K. Subban on an eight-year deal. Subban had 10 goals and 43 assists last season.
abstract: Montreal Canadiens agree to terms with defenseman P K Subban on an eight-year deal.
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Canadiens have agreed to terms with defenseman P. K. Subban on an eight-year deal. Subban had 10 goals and 43 assists last season.

headline.main: Subban and Canadiens Come to Terms
headline.print_headline: Subban and Canadiens Come to Terms
